name: Solitude - Escape of Head
description: It’s an adventure of young Emilie, who went to the world created by her little brother to save him. Emilie’s youngest brother, has locked himself in his mind after the accident...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8 Processor: Intel G4560 2x 3,5Ghz || AMD 860k 4x4Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GT 460 || Radeon HD 3800 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 750 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i3 6100 equivalent or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1050Ti || RX 560 equivalent or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1024 MB available space
